entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump So, we will all be able to get tested for Covid-19 before returning to work like Trump* promised?  You know...  to be sure we are walking into a safe workplace.
